definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Well, dearie, you don't need to ask me.
sentences.chinese: 好的，寶貝，你不用再徵求我的同意。

sentences.english: Our parents didn't want us to marry, so we eloped .
sentences.chinese: 我們的父母親不同意我們結婚，所以我們便私奔。

sentences.english: All shareholders of the company agree to the deregistration.
sentences.chinese: 公司全體股東同意撤銷註冊。

sentences.english: I think that he says that it's kind of implied consent.
sentences.chinese: 他說的是，這是某種默認的同意。

sentences.english: He had no choice but to comply, allowing the Imperials aboard.
sentences.chinese: 他別無選擇，只能照辦，同意帝國檢查隊登艦。

sentences.english: Despite all my efforts to persuade him, he wouldn't agree.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我盡力說服他，可他就是不同意。

sentences.english: He backed the costs of the new play.
sentences.chinese: 他同意承擔這出新戲的費用。

sentences.english: VSO will obtain your consent before contacting referees.
sentences.chinese: 在聯絡你的聯繫人之前我們會徵得你的同意。

sentences.english: Last June, Israel and Hamas agreed to a six-month truce.
sentences.chinese: 去年6月，以色列和哈馬斯同意6個月的停火協議。

sentences.english: Do you agree with me on that?
Well, all right, I agree with you about that, but I still prefer a big town.
sentences.chinese: 額，行，我同意你的觀點，但是我仍然更喜歡大城鎮。

sentences.english: The government agreed to backstop companies that invested in oil exploration.
sentences.chinese: 政府同意支持那些對石油勘查投資的公司。

sentences.english: And Republican leaders say that they agree we must avoid default.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨領導人說，他們同意我們必須避免債務欠付。

definition: to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
